sentences.en: George rattled on with a volubility which surprised himself.
sentences.cn: 乔治滔滔不绝地说话,连他自己听了也觉得诧异.

sentences.en: Have money all volubility, wait for me to scoop up enough I fall again.
sentences.cn: 有钱全都好说话, 等我捞够了我再下.

sentences.en: This sharp vivacity of soul , and the supple and restless volubility attending it, disturb our negotiations.
sentences.cn: 才思太过敏捷, 锋芒过于显露, 是人与人之间沟通交流的一大障碍.

words.tran_cn: 健谈的；缠绕的；易旋转的
